This vignette demos the study design.

```{r}

set.seed(16); 
simulate_interval_censoring(
    study_cohort_size = 2, 
    years_in_study = 10, 
    probability_of_ever_seroconverting = 1) |> 
    plot_censoring_data(
      labelled_IDs = 1:2,
        xmax = lubridate::ymd("2003-01-01"),
        s_vjust = -1
    ) |> 
    print()

```
